meanings.definition: To send off or away with speed
meanings.sent1: The courier will despatch the package today.
meanings.sent2: Please despatch the urgent message to headquarters immediately.
meanings.sent3: In a rush, she had to despatch the letter before catching the train.
meanings.sent4: The superhero despatched the villain with lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The captain despatched his orders swiftly, ensuring the mission's success.
